Good

The shade matches my skin perfectly (light to medium neutral undertone). Previously I used whitish custard. But even though it's whitish, it doesn't make it look gray and doesn't flash back on camera. Luckily, the custard doesn't look patchy on my hands because my hands are a little whiter than my face. If your skin isn't that white, it's better not to use custard. I'm afraid it will look patchy on my hands and neck if I don't wear a hijab. The coverage is super good for me who doesn't have much texture on my face and if my skin prep is right, it doesn't make it cakey. When it sets, it's not sticky but it doesn't feel matte and tight. Comfortable on the skin. I like all of Esqa's complexion products. In the photo, I'm using Granola concealer, Esqa Granola powder foundation (applied with a brush), and finally I used Esqa vanilla setting powder to help blur pores. I have a reddish allergic pimple near a mole but it's not visible at all because it's covered by concealer. Real photo without filter using sunlight in a shady place. Awesome. recommended product üëçüèª
